long_desc.thetext: Should also mention that the DOM node corresponding to the SimpleType representing (C & I) is marked as malformed. If the code given in comment #0 is a valid program, I will raise a separate bug for that as well.

I think this bug was a regression introduced by https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=409236#c9
I'll take a look.
(In reply to Jayaprakash Arthanareeswaran from comment #1) > Should also mention that the DOM node corresponding to the SimpleType > representing (C & I) is marked as malformed. If the code given in comment #0 > is a valid program, I will raise a separate bug for that as well.
It is a valid program. I am surprised that we would mark it MALFORMED. This is just a plain IntersectionCastTypeReference. Were you at the right JLS level ? Upto JLS4 it should be malformed and at JLS8 it should be fine.

(In reply to Srikanth Sankaran from comment #2) > It is a valid program. I am surprised that we would mark it MALFORMED. > This is just a plain IntersectionCastTypeReference. Were you at the right > JLS level ? Upto JLS4 it should be malformed and at JLS8 it should be fine.
Sorry, my mistake. I had checked out ASTView projects from master. Obviously we won't see JLS8 specifics, will we.

(In reply to Srikanth Sankaran from comment #2) > I think this bug was a regression introduced by > https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=409236#c9
